div.p: ( a) Factorial contributions of vegetation dynamics (V), solar shortwave radiation (R), wind speed (W), atmospheric CO 2 concentration (C), actual air vapor pressure (H), air temperature (T), and their two-way and higher-order interactions affecting global land ET; ( b) yearly contributions of the most influential factor, V, and sum of the other factors affecting global land ET. This figure was created using the IDL Core Version 7.1.2.
